question: How does FoodChow help me get more online orders?
answer: FoodChow gives you a commission-free online ordering system, a branded website, and marketing tools to attract and retain customers directly—helping you grow your digital orders without paying hefty platform fees.

question: What are the benefits of using FoodChow instead of Zomato or Swiggy?
answer: Unlike Zomato or Swiggy, FoodChow doesn’t charge high commissions. You get to keep 100% of your revenue, build customer loyalty, and manage your brand through your own ordering system and website. And we provide marketing service that will not provide by any of them. we are best in marketing.

question: Is there any commission fee on orders?
answer: No, FoodChow does not charge any commission on orders. You get to keep all the revenue from your customers.

question: Can I get my own branded ordering website?
answer: Yes! FoodChow allows you to create your own branded ordering website with your menu, logo, domain name, and payment options.

question: How can I become a FoodChow partner?
answer: To become a partner, you can sign up through our partnership page. We offer affiliate, white-label, and reseller programs depending on your goals and region.

question: Can I rebrand the FoodChow platform with my own logo and domain?
answer: Yes, with our white-label partnership model, you can rebrand FoodChow with your own domain, logo, and name. It's ideal for agencies, consultants, or tech entrepreneurs.

question: How much can I earn as a FoodChow partner?
answer: Earnings depend on the partnership model. Affiliates earn per successful referral, while white-label resellers set their own pricing and margins when onboarding restaurants.

question: Is FoodChow free to use?
answer: Yes, we offer a free basic listing and commission-free ordering tools. Premium features like white-label sites or custom apps may have a fee.

question: Do you provide customer analytics or reports?
answer: Yes, FoodChow provides real-time reports, customer data insights, order history, and performance metrics so you can make data-driven decisions.

question: What kind of businesses can use FoodChow?
answer: FoodChow is ideal for restaurants, cafés, cloud kitchens, tiffin services, food trucks, and even catering businesses.

question: How long does it take to set up my restaurant on FoodChow?
answer: You can get started in just a few minutes with basic setup. For a full branded website and custom features, setup may take 1–3 business days.

question: Can I use FoodChow without a website?
answer: Yes, FoodChow can generate a free ordering page for you, even if you don’t have a website.

question: Can I manage multiple branches with one account?
answer: Yes, you can manage multiple outlets or branches under a single FoodChow dashboard.

question: Can I offer discount coupons or promo codes?
answer: Absolutely. FoodChow allows you to create and manage promotional offers, coupons, and loyalty discounts for your customers.

question: Do I need technical knowledge to use FoodChow?
answer: Not at all. FoodChow is designed to be simple and intuitive. You can manage your store, orders, and promotions without any technical expertise.

question: Can I become a reseller in my region?
answer: Yes, FoodChow offers a white-label partner program where you can sell our platform under your brand and manage local restaurants.

question: Is FoodChow available internationally?
answer: Yes, FoodChow is available globally. You can use or resell it in your own region with local settings and payment integrations.

question: What support does FoodChow offer to partners?
answer: Partners receive training, marketing resources, onboarding help, and technical support to successfully grow their client base.

question: What’s the difference between affiliate and white-label partner?
answer: Affiliates refer restaurants and earn commission per sale. White-label partners create their own brand on top of FoodChow and can set their own pricing and manage their own clients.

question: Can FoodChow support dine-in and takeaway ordering?
answer: Yes, we support QR-based dine-in ordering, takeaway, delivery, and scheduled pickup—all in one system.
